title: Funny Farfalle Pasta Noodle Candle – Creamy Vanilla Scented Soy Wax Candle, Food-Shaped Gag Gift for Chefs & Food Lovers, Cute Italian Kitchen Decor & Party Favors (Farfalle)
features: 【Realistic Pasta Design】This funny Farfalle Pasta Candle mimics the look of classic Italian pasta with its butterfly shape and vibrant yellow hue. Fun and eye-catching, this food shaped candle adds a whimsical touch to shelves or tabletops.
【Creamy Vanilla Scent】This food shaped candle releases a rich, creamy blend of sweet vanilla and buttery notes, filling your space with a warm, food-inspired aroma.
【Perfect Gift for Foodies】Looking for a creative and funny gift idea?This funny candle makes the perfect novelty gift for pasta lovers, home chefs, and anyone who enjoys Italian themed gifts.
【Natural Soy Wax 】Our vanilla scented candle is made with natural soy wax and a creamy vanilla aroma with a hint of sweetness, offering a clean, non-toxic burn.

【Great for Festive Gifting】This novelty candle comes in a stylish gift box (5.5 x 3.54 x 3.15 inches) and is ready to gift. A fun and thoughtful choice for Thanksgiving, Christmas, White Elephant, April Fools' Day, or Secret Santa.
